title: Responsive
description: Responsive, mobile-first design, so your site will look great on any device.

title: Integration
description: Integrated with a separete node server, so you can easily access the data. Authentication is done using JWT tokens.

title: HTTP Cookies Only
description: Frontend and backend integration is done using HTTP cookies only. No need to store tokens in local storage.

title: Refresh Token
description: Example of using refresh tokens to get a new access token when it expires is included.
